title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When attempting to open a file with a different type of editor, if the file is already open, nothing happens.
EB: When attempting to open a file with a different type of editor, if the file is already open, a new editor should be opened for the file based on the selected editor type.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a new basic project.
2. Create a new file called 'test.xml' using the Default Text Editor.
3. Open the 'test.xml' file in the Navigator.
4. Right-click on the 'test.xml' file and choose 'Open With...'.
5. Select a different type of editor from the options.
6. Note that nothing happens and the file remains open in the Default Text Editor.

Expected result: The file should be opened in a new editor based on the selected editor type.
